10k Visits.Description: This badge is awarded to users who have recieved at least 10k visits across all of their personal places.

100k Visits.Description: This badge is awarded to users who have recieved at least 100k visits across all of their personal places.

1m Visits.Description: This badge is awarded to users who have recieved at least 1m visits across all of their personal places.

5m Visits.Description: This badge is awarded to users who have recieved at least 5m visits across all of their personal places.

10m Visits.Description: This badge is awarded to users who have recieved at least 10m visits across all of their personal places.

UGC Creator.Description: This badge is awarded to users who are part of the Roblox User Generated Content program.

Accelerator.Description: This badge is awarded to users who are part of the Roblox Accelerator program.

Star Creator.Description: This badge is awarded to users who are part of the Roblox Video Stars program.
